answers.answer: Im 7 weeks pregnant and on my first appointment (for my pregnancy confirmation) my doctor had me get blood test right away. Wonder why they haven't done them on you yet maybe you should request them. had my app at 6weeks. Have you had your first appointment or ultrasound yet???

Blood tests for what? They should have taken a lot of blood at one of your first appts.. and then there r tests for abnormalities but im not sure if those require a blood test since i opted out but i think those start after 12 weeks..

For confirmation of pregnancy yes,I have done blood test,after that one in 13week for abnormalities,but after that no. I've been on ultrasound,approximately once in a month.I was wondering what tests are needed to do trough all pregnancy ?
Oo! I haven't had blood drawn since the first time at about 8 weeks and im 24 weeks now. I know they draw blood for the gestational diabetes test but not sure if they do anymore after that :)
Gosh sounds like your doc has had u do   more than what my.doc has done im only 7 weeks thats probably why sorry I cant help
I had blood taken once in early pregnancy, then for the gd test. Now I have to go on Saturday to get blood taken, but that's because I'm having a csection on Monday.

question: Can someone please tell me in which week I should do blood tests?I m 16 weeks and haven't done any blood test...
title: blood tests
